about_the_game:
With the city overrun with supernatural beings and occurrences, it is up to two women to restore the city to its former state. In order to accomplish such a task, sexual rituals must be performed by these women at the shrines scattered throughout the city. And when considering the aforementioned, getting to each of these shrines will become a task on its own…

Throughout the yuri-themed, pseudo 8-bit beat-em-up called Kuudere Funk, players will fight various enemies with varying attack patterns in a manner highly influenced by modern melee combat games from a quasi top-down/isometric perspective. Beyond battling, players will also encounter stealth and puzzle sections before being treated to intimate scenes between our leading ladies at the shrines.

Features:
- Various enemies with their own attack patterns to overcome
- Stealth and puzzle sections
- Intimate yuri scenes
- Pseudo 8-bit pixel-art visuals
- Lofi, funky hip-hop soundtrack
- Supports Xbox Series, Xbox One, and Xbox 360 Controllers (recommended)

content_descriptors.notes: Contains scenes of sexual intimacy between two women. Breasts and genitalia are visible. All characters in game are aged 18 years or over.

name: Kuudere Funk

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Window XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 VRAM
  • Storage: 17 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended for use with Xbox Series, Xbox One, and Xbox 360 Controllers
